subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dallas overcame a 22-point deficit, a deafening crowd and Dirk Nowitzki’s foul trouble, but finally succumbed to San Antonio in Game 6 and was eliminated in the first round.
snippet: Dallas overcame a 22-point deficit, a deafening crowd and Dirk Nowitzki’s foul trouble, but finally succumbed to San Antonio in Game 6 and was eliminated in the first round.
